Journals

Yoon, A. (Jul, 2023). Building Community Capacity for User-centered Data Curation Services. Invited talk at Korea Social Science Data Archive, Seoul National University, South Korea.

Yoon, A. (June, 2022). Data curation and reuse: Opportunities and challenges. Invited talk at Ewha Womans University South Korea.

Yoon, A., Copeland, A., & McNally, P. (2018). Empowering communities with data: Role of data intermediaries for communities’ data utilization. Proceedings of Association for Information Science and Technology (ASIS&T) Annual Meeting, 55 (1), 583-592. https://doi.org/10.1002/pra2.2018.14505501063 [paper]
